name: MaerzMusik 2026
description: MaerzMusik is Berlin's experimental music festival celebrating innovations in the art of soundâ€”music, theater, concerts, artistic soundscapes. With ensemble performances, live art, and multimedia events across multiple venues, the festival pushes boundaries of sound. The 2026 lineup includes Ensemble Dedalus, Querklangorchester, and more, exploring everything from contemporary composition to radical sonic experimentation. A rare chance to experience Europe's most forward-thinking sound art and performance festival.
